Statute.Title: Saskatchewan Act (1905, c. 42) (see also R.S.C. 1970, Appendix II, No. 20) (see also R.S., 1985, Appendix II, No. 21)

Section.Text: repealed, Constitution Amendment, 2022 (Saskatchewan Act) see SI/2022-25

CIF.Text: CIF, s. 24 deemed to have been made on August 29, 1966, and is retroactive to that date
